resources.string:
Hints:
1. Put restriction policy values you want to make it nonfunctional to the below text area. One value one line. Then press the bottom right button to save.
2. To get restriction values, check [Constant Value] on here (Android developer references website).
3. You also can use [dumpsys device_policy](via adb shell or root) to check what restriction policies have applied on your device.
4. Please check Xposed(LSPosed) log to see this module and policies loaded correctly or not.
5. Xposed/LSPosed Mode: Now in LSPosed mode. Your custom policies will be saved correctly for LSPosed.

5. Xposed/LSPosed Mode: Now in Compatible mode(LSPosed not detected). If you are using LSPosed, please activate this module and reboot before click the save button! Otherwise your policies will not be saved correctly!
